preferences.title: List of vice hosts
preferences.description: comma separated list of vice hosts(For access to which you will be punished by lowering your HP.)
preferences.name: viceHosts

preferences.title: Habit Time
preferences.name: penaltytime
preferences.description: Time when penalties for visiting unproductive websites do apply

author: lexa <lexa@cfotr.com>
name: habitrpg-mozilla
description: This is a Firefox extension for HabitRPG. HabitRPG is a habit tracker app which treats your goals like a Role Playing Game. Level up as you succeed, lose HP as you fail, earn money to buy weapons and armor. This extension tracking visited websites, and remove health points for visiting vice,entertaining,procrastinate websites.
